description: Decimal expansion of area under the curve 1/Gamma(x) from zero to infinity.
comments: Referred to as the Fransén-Robinson constant.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1001
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Fransén-Robinson Constant
mathematica: RealDigits[ NIntegrate[ 1 / Gamma[ x ], {x, 0, Infinity}, AccuracyGoal -> 72, WorkingPrecision -> 90 ] ][ [ 1 ] ]
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jan 05 2001
extensions: More terms from Philip Sung (philip_sung(AT)hotmail.com), Jan 22 2002
